name: Arkanoidx
body:
### Arkanoidx.
Arkanoidx is a 2D game developed with libgdx game engine and Java language.
It's a clone of classical Arkanoid created to teach about developing games with libgdx and Java

Also, I have upload this project at GitHub to teach about code repositories and to share code about several developers who work together.

This web page have been created with _GitHub Page Creator_

***

_Santiago Faci_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
